text: Danijel Bajlo (born 29 June 1973) is a Croatian rower. He competed in the men's double sculls event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Croatia Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Zadar
title: Danijel Bajlo
